Brian Jean Drinking Game

Brian Jean Drinking Game

25-04-2015

New drinking game (slash candy-eating game for those who prefer their amusement in candy form): watch the Alberta leaders debate and count how many times Brian Jean says "the Wildrose is the only party that will not raise taxes" instead of actually answering the question. He's one person in a four-person debate, so there's a limit to how much of the time he can spend talking. But he's managed to shoe-horn that phrase, or some minor variation on it into all but two of the topics, usually by just ignoring the topic altogether.
